Name: Whizz Ball
About the game: Whizz Ball is a high speed cross between Pong, Breakout and Pinball. *** PLEASE NOTE *** The use of a controller is highly recommended. The keyboard and mouse can be used in single player games only. Play single player against the computer or with up to 4 friends locally. Customise your experience with only the options you want in the game. Make it steady and simple or fast and frantic. Defend your blocks and redirect the ball towards your opponents. Use after touch and take control of the ball. Powerups and powerdowns affect your bat or the ball. Score points to restore lost blocks.
